mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Smith, William

mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Smith, William Patient Age: 24. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Typho malarial fever having ben six [sick] ten days before admission. Result: Died of inflammation of the brian.
